title: Mortgage Bonds Rally as Trump Demands $200 Billion of Purchases
description: Mortgage backed securities rallied relative to Treasuries on Thursday after US President Donald Trump said he was directing the purchase of $200 billion of mortgage bonds.
content: Mortgage backed securities rallied relative to Treasuries on Thursday after US President Donald Trump said he was directing the purchase of $200 billion of mortgage bonds.
